#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
 int gcd(int a,int b)
{  int rem;
    while(min(a,b)>0)
    {  int rem;
       if(a>b)
           {
            rem=a%b;
            a=rem;
           }
       else
        {rem=b%a;
        b=rem;}


    }
 return max(a,b);
}
int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    int i,j;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,q;
        cin>>n;
        cin>>q;

         int arr[n+1],lft[n+1],rht[n+1];

        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
           cin>>arr[i];
           lft[1]=arr[1];

        for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
             lft[i]=gcd(lft[i-1],arr[i]);
           rht[n]=arr[n];
           for(i=n-1;i>0;i--)
           {
              rht[i]=gcd(rht[i+1],arr[i]);
           }
    while(q--)
     {
        int l,r,c;
        cin>>l>>r;
      if(l==1)
        cout<<rht[r+1];
      else if(r==n)
        cout<<lft[l-1];
      else
       cout<<gcd(lft[l-1],rht[r+1]);
        cout<<"\n";
       }
     }

return 0;
}
